EmailTemplate.description: Not an actionable feedback item but would like to thank the customer
EmailTemplate.name: ManagerFeedbackClosed_SendThankYou
EmailTemplate.subject: Manager Feedback:{!Managers_Feedback__c.Name}:{!Managers_Feedback__c.Subject__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Managers_Feedback__c.CreatedBy},
Thank you for submitting feedback on the {!Managers_Feedback__c.Service_Area__c} process while using the employee portal on {!Managers_Feedback__c.CreatedDate}. This type of thoughtful feedback is extremely helpful and important to us in delivering the highest levels of quality and service to our valuable customers. We look forward to any additional feedback you have on our process at Sutter Shared Services.
Sincerely,
{!Managers_Feedback__c.OwnerFullName}
